h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Yellow Wind Sage
content: As thanks for reuniting the head with its owner, you’ll be able to claim the next of the Great Sage’s Relic: Fuming Ears. Like the other Relic, you can select one of three passive talents to awaken (and can re-select them later in the respec menu if you wish):
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Yellow Wind Sage'.
The content is as follows:
As thanks for reuniting the head with its owner, you’ll be able to claim the next of the Great Sage’s Relic: Fuming Ears. Like the other Relic, you can select one of three passive talents to awaken (and can re-select them later in the respec menu if you wish):
